column2: It is  noteworthy that the procedure relevant to  confiscating a vehicle under Forest
specifically requires a vehicle owner to prove that he in fact took all precautions to
prevent  an  offence  being  committed  utilizing  his  vehicle.  I  observe  that  the  law

column1: pertaining  to  confiscating  a  vehicle  under  Forest  Ordinance  had  been  correctly

column2: applied by the Learned Magistrate. The Learned Magistrate has held as follows;
